625997147.name: Excellent place for skating
625997147.author: a TripAdvisor user
625997147.reviewBody: The park is really big. It has a big parking lot and it is free. I went there for skating, the place for doing is really cool, you can practice a lot of tricks because of the different stages it has. Also the pathway to arrive is really nice

address.streetAddress: Avenida Estado de Mexico

457189340.name: Beautiful crafts, LOW prices!
457189340.author: a TripAdvisor user
457189340.reviewBody: We have been coming here for 20 years, buying things our home, presents for family and friends in the USA, and also bringing foreign visitors. The variety of products is stunning, and lower prices would be hard to find anywhere else in Central Mexico. For example, we just bought a new water jug base for 220 pesos. I have seen similar models in more upscale shops in Toluca for 400-500 pesos, and in more formal stores for even more.

address.streetAddress: Calle Miguel Hidalgo

349407353.name: Trees of Life artist
349407353.author: a TripAdvisor user
349407353.reviewBody: Miguel Angel is a talented artist who works on the trees of life for the most part.  He also does wonderful and creative Katrinas.  His work[lace is also the family home.  There is art everywhere!  Wonderful tiles.  Some very big trees of life and many smaller ones that are for sale.  A bit hard to find, depending on your taxi driver, but glad I made the trip.

address.streetAddress: I.M Altamirano #212

631280889.name: I got married here!
631280889.author: a TripAdvisor user
631280889.reviewBody: Well, for obvious reasons this place has a special meaning for me. The Convent was funded on 16th Century, the facade is Barroque and it has painting at the Claustro.

itemReviewed.name: Ex Convento Franciscano San Juan Bautista

address.streetAddress: Ave Estaddo de Mexico Barrio Santiaguito

569196948.name: You must
569196948.author: a TripAdvisor user
569196948.reviewBody: Very old and with a lot of original murals, Wallis columns, and the smell denote old and history of this place

itemReviewed.name: Ex Convento Franciscano San Juan Bautista

address.streetAddress: Ave Estaddo de Mexico Barrio Santiaguito

497086617.name: Majestuoso conjunto colonial/Majestic colonial church and exconvent.
497086617.author: a TripAdvisor user
497086617.reviewBody: Es la Iglesia principal de Metepec, sobria fachada, amplio patio atrial y arm\u00f3nico interior/This is the main church. It has a sober facade, a big atrium and an a harmonious interior.

itemReviewed.name: Ex Convento Franciscano San Juan Bautista

address.streetAddress: Ave Estaddo de Mexico Barrio Santiaguito

367611588.name: Nice
367611588.author: a TripAdvisor user
367611588.reviewBody: It\'s a small and very colorful church. You will be visiting a typical small town church. You may find several sculptures and paintings.

itemReviewed.name: Ex Convento Franciscano San Juan Bautista

address.streetAddress: Ave Estaddo de Mexico Barrio Santiaguito

359372855.name: Gorgeous!
359372855.author: a TripAdvisor user
359372855.reviewBody: It\'s a wonderful place to visit. It\'s free and you get to visit the ex convent too. The doors are really small and the paintings on the walls really old. Made me feel like I was in a movie. We went for Easter this year and it was magical!

itemReviewed.name: Ex Convento Franciscano San Juan Bautista

address.streetAddress: Ave Estaddo de Mexico Barrio Santiaguito

338959792.name: Lovely!
338959792.author: a TripAdvisor user
338959792.reviewBody: Beautiful church in a lovely setting, not to be missed if you visit Metepec!\nThe place has a very rich history - read the Wikipedia article about Metepec for the full story

itemReviewed.name: Ex Convento Franciscano San Juan Bautista

address.streetAddress: Ave Estaddo de Mexico Barrio Santiaguito

569196755.name: Excellent , a must
569196755.author: a TripAdvisor user
569196755.reviewBody: Lots of historic background of the makeing of artesanal pot or religuos instrumenta of arcilla, beautiful things to see

address.streetAddress: Avenida Estado de Mexico

538093992.name: Great Trees of Life!
538093992.author: a TripAdvisor user
538093992.reviewBody: A very nice small museum featuring the famous Trees of Life from Metepec.  There are some real masterpieces here, some as high as 2 meters!  There is also a gigantic cooking pot on the first floor that you\'ll be amazed at.  Highly recommended!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Estado de Mexico

534303101.name: Beautiful ceramics
534303101.author: a TripAdvisor user
534303101.reviewBody: This is an interesting place if you\'re into ceramics. There\'s very little on the ground floor, but on the next floor there is the most beautiful collection of ceramics. Metepec is famous for it\'s Arbols del Vida/Muerte - Trees of life/death. The displays are beautiful, but not always labelled. It\'s a good day trip from Mexico City by bus.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Estado de Mexico

327693555.name: modest, small, but really worthwhile
327693555.author: a TripAdvisor user
327693555.reviewBody: Museo del Barro in Metepec, is located two blocks behind the old franciscan convent and the chuch of Saint John the baptist. It is a small place with not much museography but on the lower floor there is what they say is the largest terracotta sauce pan in the world (claimed to be in Guiness book) and an impressive  3 sides  arbol de vida ; on the upper floor there is a very nice collection of terracotta masterpieces , especially a few astonishing "Arbol de vida" by mexican artists  and some painted jars, plates..\nThe entrance was free and we were showed around by a very kind local policeman who switched on the light for us.\nwhile METEPEC as a town is not really attractive , we had a good time there with  the visit of the museum, the monday market and the many shops selling terracotta pieces and especially ARBOLES DE VIDA

address.streetAddress: Avenida Estado de Mexico

538094266.name: Nice place for people watching
538094266.author: a TripAdvisor user
538094266.reviewBody: Between it\'s giant ceramic mermaid and lovely fountain, this is a great place to hang out.  I just loved people watching here.  We were pretty much the only foreigners in Metepec, as far as I could figure out, and it\'s one of the nicest Magic Towns in Mexico.

address.streetAddress: Plaza Juarez

457183152.name: Kids love this place!
457183152.author: a TripAdvisor user
457183152.reviewBody: My kids love to come here and have held their birthday parties here. The facilities are ok, could be a bit cleaner, and it smells like a locker room. The food is just so-so. I would recommend eating lunch somewhere else.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Toluca Metepec, 719

604465871.name: Magia y adrenalina
604465871.author: a TripAdvisor user
604465871.reviewBody: Es una experiencia que vale disfrutar siempre que se pueda, adrenalina, imaginaci\u00f3n e intelecto trabajando juntos con el objetivo de pasar 60 minutos de manera maravillosa.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

604357311.name: Muy buena experiencia.
604357311.author: a TripAdvisor user
604357311.reviewBody: Una experiencia divertida, diferente y muy interesante. La planeaci\u00f3n es buena y muy creativas. Algo diferente y original.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

589745092.name: Excelente experiencia
589745092.author: a TripAdvisor user
589745092.reviewBody: Me encantan los temas y los acertijos para las habitaciones, ponerte a pensar mas all\u00e1 de los obvio y al final es lo obvio me encanta

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

579414918.name: Excelente!
579414918.author: a TripAdvisor user
579414918.reviewBody: Muy interesante,din\u00e1mico y familiar, la din\u00e1mica permite que todos los miembros puedan participar \ud83d\ude0f

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

575279795.name: Bright Xcape
575279795.author: a TripAdvisor user
575279795.reviewBody: Me encant\u00f3 el lugar, aunque es un poco dif\u00edcil de encontrar. Sugerir\u00eda que le pusieran m\u00e1s acci\u00f3n cuando se acabara el tiempo, como por ejemplo, que en el Campus de la universidad s\u00ed hubiera un asesino que entrara por los jugadores.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

556340562.name: Buen servicio
556340562.author: a TripAdvisor user
556340562.reviewBody: El lugar no se ve a simple vista, me pareci\u00f3 algo escondido, sin embargo el servicio fue bueno y la habitaci\u00f3n muy entretenida.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

554387483.name: Una experiencia incre\u00edble que te pone a prueba.
554387483.author: a TripAdvisor user
554387483.reviewBody: Bright Xcape son cuartos de escape que realmente retan tus habilidades y el trabajo en equipo. Me encant\u00f3 la ambientaci\u00f3n de los cuartos, probamos oscuridad nazi y campus 1, estaba tan alerta de lo q pod\u00eda pasar y pasamos un d\u00eda incre\u00edble resolviendo los acertijos. Nos sentimos tan dentro de la historia pues los cuartos est\u00e1n incre\u00edbles y las pistas para escapar muy bien dise\u00f1adas. Lo recomiendo ampliamente y no puedo esperar a probar los dem\u00e1s cuartos de escape.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

552297887.name: Una Experiencia \u00danica
552297887.author: a TripAdvisor user
552297887.reviewBody: Me encanto, fue una experiencia muy sorprendente. La fachada del edificio no ayuda mucho pero nos explicaron que est\u00e1n remodel\u00e1ndolo el primer piso. Pero olvidando ese detalle la experiencia fue excelente, la atenci\u00f3n muy buena. \n\nAltamente recomendado!!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

550071058.name: Excelente
550071058.author: a TripAdvisor user
550071058.reviewBody: La din\u00e1mica del lugar es original, nos han gustado bastante las ideas y los retos. Volveremos por los dem\u00e1s.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

549954879.name: Atr\u00e9vete
549954879.author: a TripAdvisor user
549954879.reviewBody: Es una experiencia diferente integraci\u00f3n y diversi\u00f3n para el equipo!!!\nDescubrir\u00e1n sus habilidades al superar los retos

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542911791.name: Una nueva forma de entretenimiento! Si ya te cansaste del cine, boliche, etc, ve a un Escape Room!
542911791.author: a TripAdvisor user
542911791.reviewBody: Nos sorprendi\u00f3 lo entretenido que esta el cuarto de los Nazis. La pasamos muy bien!!!\nAdem\u00e1s el trato que nos dieron fue de diez :)\nLo recomiendo para grupo de amigos.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542546724.name: Me encanto quiero regresar con amigos y familiares y conocer otro cuarto de escape
542546724.author: a TripAdvisor user
542546724.reviewBody: Pronto regresaremos en este mes yo creo q es mi cumplea\u00f1os y el de mi hijo y espero estar acompa\u00f1ada de amigos

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542545818.name: Gran juego
542545818.author: a TripAdvisor user
542545818.reviewBody: Las instalaciones son adecuadas y el personal amable, sin duda me gustar\u00eda regresar a explorar las dem\u00e1s salas

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542545063.name: Muy bueno, m\u00e1s podr\u00eda  mejorar
542545063.author: a TripAdvisor user
542545063.reviewBody: Est\u00e1 muy divertido, es algo original para hacer, aunque el edificio est\u00e1 feo, al llegar cre\u00ed que me iban a asaltar, se puede mejorar mucho en la fachada, ya una vez que est\u00e1s en el cuarto est\u00e1 genial, adem\u00e1s tienen un excelente servicio

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542543898.name: Alemania nazi
542543898.author: a TripAdvisor user
542543898.reviewBody: Muy buena ambientaci\u00f3n, buen trato y buenos retos.\nMe gusto mucho pero si es muy dif\u00edcil si no hubiese pistas.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542542374.name: Muy bien
542542374.author: a TripAdvisor user
542542374.reviewBody: \ud83d\udc4d\ud83c\udffcExcelente concepto , buena ubicaci\u00f3n e instalaciones! Ya entramos a dos cuartos , esperamos haya m\u00e1s

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542542302.name: Genial
542542302.author: a TripAdvisor user
542542302.reviewBody: La mejor experiencia de nuestra vida. Queremos volver a ir uno de estos d\u00edas, encerio, fue lo mejor.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

542540081.name: Genial experiencia
542540081.author: a TripAdvisor user
542540081.reviewBody: Es una excelente opci\u00f3n para a hacer algo diferente y una gran oportunidad de poner a prueba tus habilidades, muy buena experiencia con los amigos

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

518394034.name: Algo diferente
518394034.author: a TripAdvisor user
518394034.reviewBody: Es muy creativo y divertido pero el lugar es muy peque\u00f1o. Es muy bueno para pasar un rato diferente y divertirse

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

516259797.name: Excelente opci\u00f3n para ir con amigos!!!
516259797.author: a TripAdvisor user
516259797.reviewBody: Es un excelente servicio el que brindan en Bright Xcape, adem\u00e1s de que es muy divertido ingresar a los cuartos y probarte a ti mismo resolviendo acertijos y enigmas!!! No dejen de visitarlo!!

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

516249218.name: SUPER ENTRETENIDO
516249218.author: a TripAdvisor user
516249218.reviewBody: Una nueva manera de pasar la tarde en familia y amigos ahora por fin en Toluca, es muy entretenido y te reta como pocas otras actividades lo hacen.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

516097014.name: Inigualable
516097014.author: a TripAdvisor user
516097014.reviewBody: Una experiencia que pone a las personas en personajes con una historia bastante misteriosa e interesante, te lleva a vivir la adrenalina y promueve el apoyo en equipo

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

516096662.name: Gran Experiencia
516096662.author: a TripAdvisor user
516096662.reviewBody: Una experiencia sin igual. Te fomenta el trabajo en equipo, no lo duden, hablaran de ello por semanas, espero volver a las salas que me faltan.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares

438889912.name: Fin de semana en Bright Xcape
438889912.author: a TripAdvisor user
438889912.reviewBody: \u00a1Tienen que vivirlo! A 30 minutos del DF por autopista M\u00e9xico - Toluca. Es un concepto totalmente diferente, es una experiencia inmersiva. \u00a1Logramos escapar justo a tiempo en menos de 60 minutos, descubriendo misterios y resolviendo acertijos retadores! Muy recomendable.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Manuel J. Clouthier 1017 2nd Floor, Col. Pilares
